Item ID11789

The mystic steam staff is an elemental staff requiring 40 Attack and 40 Magic to wield. In addition to increased Melee and Magic Attack bonuses, the staff provides unlimited amounts of water and fire runes as well as the autocast option when equipped.

This staff can be created after the completion of the quest Scorpion Catcher by taking a steam battlestaff and 40,000 to Thormac. After completion of the Hard Kandarin Diary and Elite Kandarin Diary, Thormac will only require 30,000 or 20,000 respectively.

It can also be obtained through other players and bought on the Grand Exchange.

Players can use a steam staff upgrade kit, obtained from the Bounty Hunter Shop, to cosmetically enhance their mystic steam staff, creating a mystic steam staff (or). This only alters its appearance, and it becomes untradeable. It can be reverted, but the kit will not be retained.
